verbs.description: Trump [V: is] missing a simple truth : there 's a difference between seeing the strongest job growth ever and seeing the strongest job growth since 2015 .
[ARG0: Trump] is [V: missing] [ARG1: a simple truth : there 's a difference between seeing the strongest job growth ever and seeing the strongest job growth since 2015] .
Trump is missing a simple truth : there [V: 's] [ARG1: a difference between seeing the strongest job growth ever and seeing the strongest job growth since 2015] .
Trump is missing a simple truth : there 's a difference between [V: seeing] [ARG1: the strongest job growth ever] and seeing the strongest job growth since 2015 .
Trump is missing a simple truth : there 's a difference between seeing the strongest job growth ever and [V: seeing] [ARG1: the strongest job growth] [ARGM-TMP: since 2015] .
